translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the perfection of wisdom is pure.🔽The perfection of wisdom is pure because inner emptiness is pure.🔽The perfection of wisdom is pure because outer emptiness is pure.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the applications of mindfulness are pure.🔽The perfection of wisdom is pure because the right efforts are pure.🔽The perfection of wisdom is pure because the legs of miraculous power are pure.🔽The perfection of wisdom is pure because the faculties are pure.🔽The perfection of wisdom is pure because the powers are pure.🔽The perfection of wisdom is pure because the branches of enlightenment are pure.🔽The perfection of wisdom is pure because the path is pure.🔽The perfection of wisdom is pure because the ten tathāgata powers are pure.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the four fearlessnesses are pure.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the four detailed and thorough knowledges are pure.🔽The perfection of wisdom is pure because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are pure.🔽The perfection of wisdom is pure because great compassion is pure.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is completely pure.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽chen po stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // chen po stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the emptiness of emptiness is pure.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the emptiness of the great is pure.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the emptiness of ultimate reality is pure.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the emptiness of the conditioned is pure.

translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the emptiness of what transcends limits is pure.

analyzed: su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is pure because the emptiness of the beginningless and endless is pure.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of non-rejection is purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of nature is purified.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of specific characteristics is purified.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of non-things is purified.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rab 'byor / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rab 'byor / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entity is purified.

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // yang dag par spong ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol @438b tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽dbang po yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir / shes rab kyi pha rol @438b tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // dbang po yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the right efforts are purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the bases of supernatural power are purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the faculties are purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: This is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽Because the factors of awakening are pure,🔽

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the noble eightfold path is purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the meditative stabilizations are purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the immeasurables are purified.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the formless [absorptions] are purified.

original: rnam par thar pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the liberations are purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the formless absorptions are purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of internal phenomena is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of external phenomena is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of emptiness is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of great extent is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of ultimate reality is purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of the unlimited is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of non-dispersal is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of inherent existence is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of all phenomena is purified.

original: mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /🔽shes rab kyi pha @439a *//🔽rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir / shes rab kyi pha @439a *// rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of specific characteristics is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of the absence of an intrinsic nature is purified.

original: ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of the absence of anything to discard is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of the nature of non-existence is purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of the nature of existence is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the emptiness of the nature of both existence and non-existence is purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the applications of mindfulness are purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the right efforts are purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the legs of miraculous power are purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the faculties are purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the powers are purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the branches of enlightenment are purified.🔽The perfection of wisdom is purified because the path is purified.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the ten powers of the tathāgatas are purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽🔽Because of the purity of fearlessness,🔽

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because of the purification of fearlessness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽byams pa chen po yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // byams pa chen po yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because of the purification of great love.

analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa'i phyir; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rang byang chub yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i phyir /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is purified because the knowledge of all aspects is purified.”

translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom purified because smells are purified?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom purified because tastes are purified?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na rga shi yongs su dag pa'i @442a *//

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom purified due to the purification of conditioned emptiness?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom purified due to the purification of unconditioned emptiness?

original: ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /

original: ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure because the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is pure?

original: ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure because the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless is pure?

original: ji ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure because the emptiness of non-rejection is pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure because the emptiness of inherent existence is pure?

original: ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure because the emptiness of all phenomena is pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of internal phenomena?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of external phenomena?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of emptiness?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of great extent?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na mi dmigs @443a *//
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na mi dmigs @443a *//
translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of ultimate reality?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of the unlimited?

analyzed: pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of non-dispersal?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of inherent existence?

original: ji ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of all phenomena?

original: ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of other phenomena?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of its own characteristics?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of non-apprehension?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of non-existence?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of essential nature?🔽In what way is the perfection of wisdom pure due to the purity of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence?

original: ji ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the applications of mindfulness are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the right efforts are pure?
