analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na dbang po yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the legs of manifestation are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na stobs yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na stobs yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the faculties are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the powers are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the branches of awakening are pure?

original: ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the eightfold noble path is pure?

original: shes rab @443b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab @443b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the noble eightfold path is pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the noble truths are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the dhyānas are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the immeasurable aspirations are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rnam par thar pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na rnam par thar pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the formless absorptions are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the liberations are pure?

original: ji ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that you have purified the successive absorptions?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure due to the purity of the serial absorptions?

original: ji ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure due to the purity of the door of liberation of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness?

original: ji ltar na mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure due to the purity of the superknowledges?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure due to the purity of meditative stabilization?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure due to the purity of the dhāraṇī gateway?

original: @444a *// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: @444a *// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the Thus-Gone One’s powers are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the powers of the Tathāgata are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the fearlessnesses are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na byams pa chen po yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na byams pa chen po yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the detailed and thorough knowledges are pure?🔽How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the great love is pure?

original: ji ltar na snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the great compassion is pure?

original: ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: It is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽

original: ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom purified because the result of stream enterer is purified?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom purified because the result of once-returner is purified?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom purified because the result of non-returner is purified?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rang byang chub yongs su @444b dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na rang byang chub yongs su @444b dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom purified because the state of a worthy one is purified?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is the perfection of wisdom purified because a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is purified?

original: ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the knowledge of path aspects is pure?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because the knowledge of all aspects is pure?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: rab 'byor / gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the nonproduction, nonstopping, nondefilement, and nonpurification of form is the purification of form.

original: tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The nonproduction, nonstopping, nondefilement, and nonpurification of feeling is the purification of feeling.

original: 'du shes la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'du shes yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'du shes yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of perception is the non-arising and non-ceasing, the non-defilement and non-purification of perception.

original: 'du byed la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'du byed yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'du byed yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of volitional factors is the non-arising and non-ceasing, the non-defilement and non-purification of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of consciousness is the non-arising and non-ceasing, the non-defilement and non-purification of consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / mig la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mig yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rna ba la skye ba med @445a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / mig la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mig yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rna ba la skye ba med @445a *//
translated: Subhūti, the purity of the eyes is the non-arising and non-ceasing, the non-defilement and non-purification of the eyes.🔽The purity of the ears is the non-arising and non-ceasing, the non-defilement and non-purification of the ears.

original: pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rna ba yongs su dag pa'o //🔽sna la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sna yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rna ba yongs su dag pa'o // sna la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sna yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The ear is pure in being unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.🔽The nose is pure in being unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: lce la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lce yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: lce la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lce yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The tongue is pure in being unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: lus la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lus yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: lus la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lus yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The body is pure in being unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: yid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni yid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: yid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni yid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The mind is pure in being unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: rab 'byor / gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhuti: The purity of form, etc. is due to the nonproduction, nonstopping, nondefilement, and nonpurification of form, etc.

original: sgra la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sgra yongs su dag pa'o //🔽dri la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dri yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sgra la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sgra yongs su dag pa'o // dri la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dri yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of sound, etc. is due to the nonproduction, nonstopping, nondefilement, and nonpurification of sound, etc.🔽The purity of smell, etc. is due to the nonproduction, nonstopping, nondefilement, and nonpurification of smell, etc.

original: ro la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ro @445b yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: ro la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ro @445b yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of taste, etc. is due to the nonproduction, nonstopping, nondefilement, and nonpurification of taste, etc.

original: reg la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni reg yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: reg la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni reg yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of contact is that contact is unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: chos la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni chos yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: chos la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni chos yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of mental objects is that mental objects are unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: rab 'byor / mig gi rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / mig gi rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the purity of eye consciousness is that eye consciousness is unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of ear consciousness is that ear consciousness is unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the nose consciousness is that it is unborn and unceasing, uncontaminated and unpurified.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the tongue consciousness is that it is unborn and unceasing, uncontaminated and unpurified.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the body consciousness is that it is unborn and unceasing, uncontaminated and unpurified.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / @446a *//
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / @446a *//
translated: The purity of the mind consciousness is that it is unborn and unceasing, uncontaminated and unpurified.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The absence of defilement and the absence of purification is the complete purity of the mental consciousness.

original: rab 'byor / mig gi 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / mig gi 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the non-arising, non-ceasing, non-defilement, and non-purification of eye contact is the complete purity of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-defilement, and non-purification of ear contact is the complete purity of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-defilement, and non-purification of nose contact is the complete purity of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the tongue’s composite of contact is the non-production and non-stopping, the non-defilement and non-purification of the tongue’s composite of contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the body’s composite of contact is the non-production and non-stopping, the non-defilement and non-purification of the body’s composite of contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the mind’s composite of contact is the non-production and non-stopping, the non-defilement and non-purification of the mind’s composite of contact.

original: @446b rab 'byor /
analyzed: @446b rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-defiling, and non-purifying of feelings conditioned by eye contact is the purity of feelings conditioned by eye contact.🔽The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-defiling, and non-purifying of feelings conditioned by ear contact is the purity of feelings conditioned by ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-defiling, and non-purifying of feelings conditioned by nose contact is the purity of feelings conditioned by nose contact.🔽The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-defiling, and non-purifying of feelings conditioned by tongue contact is the purity of feelings conditioned by tongue contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang; 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang; 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the condition in which feelings arise from the contact of the tongue is the non-arising and non-ceasing of feelings that arise from the contact of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni @447a *//
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni @447a *//
translated: The purity of the condition in which feelings arise from the contact of the body is the non-arising and non-ceasing of feelings that arise from the contact of the body.🔽The purity of the condition in which feelings arise from the contact of the mind is the non-arising and non-ceasing of feelings that arise from the contact of the mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the condition in which feelings arise from the contact of the mind is the non-defilement and non-purification of feelings that arise from the contact of the mind.

original: rab 'byor / sa'i khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sa'i khams yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / sa'i khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sa'i khams yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the earth element is the purification of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni chu'i khams yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni chu'i khams yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the water element is the purification of the water element.

original: me'i khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni me'i khams yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: me'i khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni me'i khams yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the fire element is the purification of the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rlung gi khams yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rlung gi khams yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the wind element is the purification of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni nam mkha'i khams yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni nam mkha'i khams yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The space element is pure because it is unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The consciousness element is pure because it is unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: rab 'byor / ma rig pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ma rig pa yongs su @447b dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / ma rig pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ma rig pa yongs su @447b dag pa'o //
translated: “Subhūti, ignorance is pure because it is unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: 'du byed la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'du byed yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'du byed yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Formations are pure because they are unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is pure in its non-arising, non-cessation, non-defilement, and non-purification.

original: ming dang gzugs la skye ba med pa dang; 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ming dang gzugs yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la skye ba med pa dang; 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ming dang gzugs yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Name-and-form is pure in its non-arising, non-cessation, non-defilement, and non-purification.

original: skye mched drug la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni skye mched drug yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni skye mched drug yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The six sense sources are pure in their non-arising, non-cessation, non-defilement, and non-purification.

original: reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni reg pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Contact is pure in its non-arising, non-cessation, non-defilement, and non-purification.🔽Feeling is pure in its non-arising, non-cessation, non-defilement, and non-purification.

original: tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni tshor ba yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of sensation is the non-arising and non-ceasing, the non-affliction and non-purification of sensation.

original: sred pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sred pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sred pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of craving is the non-arising and non-ceasing, the non-affliction and non-purification of craving.

original: len pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni len pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽srid pa la skye ba med pa @448a *//
analyzed: len pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni len pa yongs su dag pa'o // srid pa la skye ba med pa @448a *//
translated: The purity of appropriation is the non-arising and non-ceasing, the non-affliction and non-purification of appropriation.

original: dang; 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni srid pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: dang; 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni srid pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of existence is the non-arising and non-ceasing, the non-affliction and non-purification of existence.

original: skye ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni skye ba yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni skye ba yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of birth is the purification of birth.

original: rga shi la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rga shi yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rga shi yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of old age and death is the purification of old age and death.

original: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the perfection of giving is the purification of the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the perfection of morality is the purification of the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is purified by the non-production, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of patience.🔽The perfection of effort is purified by the non-production, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol @448b tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol @448b tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is purified by the non-production, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rab 'byor / nang stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rab 'byor / nang stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the perfection of wisdom is the purification of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of inner emptiness is the purification of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni phyi stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni phyi stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of outer emptiness is the purification of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang; 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang; 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of inner and outer emptiness is the purity of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of emptiness of emptiness is the purity of emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni chen po stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / @449a *//
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni chen po stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / @449a *//
translated: The non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of great emptiness is the purity of great emptiness.🔽The non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of ultimate emptiness is the purity of ultimate emptiness.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The absence of defilement and the absence of purification is the purity of the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The absence of arising, the absence of ceasing, the absence of defilement, and the absence of purification in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is the purity of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽The absence of arising, the absence of ceasing, the absence of defilement, and the absence of purification in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is the purity of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang; 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang; 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The absence of arising, the absence of ceasing, the absence of defilement, and the absence of purification in the emptiness of what transcends limits is the purity of the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Non-production, non-stopping, non-affliction, and non-purification in the emptiness of no beginning and no end is the purification of the emptiness of no beginning and no end.🔽Non-production, non-stopping, non-affliction, and non-purification in the emptiness of no end is the purification of the emptiness of no end.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Non-production, non-stopping, non-affliction, and non-purification in the emptiness of inherent existence is the purification of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽Non-production, non-stopping, non-affliction, and non-purification in the emptiness of no end is the purification of the emptiness of no end.🔽Non-production, non-stopping, non-affliction, and non-purification in the emptiness of inherent existence is the purification of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad @449b stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad @449b stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of all phenomena in emptiness of all phenomena is the purity of the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of individual characteristics in the emptiness of individual characteristics is the purity of the emptiness of individual characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-cessation, non-affliction, and non-purification of non-apprehension in the emptiness of non-apprehension is the purity of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the emptiness of non-existent things is the purification of the emptiness of non-existent things.🔽The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the emptiness of own-marks is the purification of the emptiness of own-marks.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the emptiness of the own-being of non-existence is the purification of the emptiness of the own-being of non-existence.

original: rab 'byor / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su @450a *//🔽dag pa'o // yang dag par spong ba rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni yang dag par spong ba yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su @450a *// dag pa'o // yang dag par spong ba rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni yang dag par spong ba yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the non-arising, non-ceasing, non-affliction, and non-purification of the applications of mindfulness is the purity of the applications of mindfulness.🔽The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-affliction, and non-purification of the right efforts is the purity of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-affliction, and non-purification of the legs of miraculous power is the purity of the legs of miraculous power.

original: dbang po rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dbang po yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dbang po yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the faculties is that the faculties are unborn and unceasing, uncontaminated and unpurified.

original: stobs rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni stobs yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni stobs yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the powers is that the powers are unborn and unceasing, uncontaminated and unpurified.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the branches of awakening is that the branches of awakening are unborn and unceasing, uncontaminated and unpurified.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the noble eightfold path is that the noble eightfold path is unborn and unceasing, uncontaminated and unpurified.

original: rab 'byor / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs @450b pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽bsam gtan rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs @450b pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su dag pa'o // bsam gtan rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the noble truths is the purification of the noble truths.🔽The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the concentrations is the purification of the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the immeasurables is the purification of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rnam par thar pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par thar pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'o // rnam par thar pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par thar pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the formless meditative absorptions is that they are unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.🔽The purity of the liberations is that they are unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the serial absorptions is that they are unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang; mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa @451a *//🔽nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang; mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa @451a *// nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-affliction, and non-purification of the emptiness gate of liberation, signless gate of liberation, and wishless gate of liberation is the purification of the emptiness gate of liberation, signless gate of liberation, and wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-affliction, and non-purification of the superknowledges is the purification of the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-affliction, and non-purification of the meditative stabilizations is the purification of the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are pure in being unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are pure in being unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The fearlessnesses are pure in being unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa'o //🔽byams pa chen po la skye ba med pa dang / @451b 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni byams pa chen po yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa'o // byams pa chen po la skye ba med pa dang / @451b 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni byams pa chen po yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the analytical knowledges is their non-arising and non-ceasing, their non-defilement and non-purification.🔽The purity of great loving kindness is its non-arising and non-ceasing, its non-defilement and non-purification.

original: snying rje chen po la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang; kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of great compassion is its non-arising and non-ceasing, its non-defilement and non-purification.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The eighteen special qualities of the Buddha, being unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified, are the purity of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha.🔽The fruit of stream-entry, being unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified, is the purity of the fruit of stream-entry.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The fruit of once-returning, being unborn, unceasing, uncontaminated, and unpurified, is the purity of the fruit of once-returning.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-affliction, and non-purification of the fruit of non-returning is the purity of the fruit of non-returning.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //🔽rang byang chub la skye ba @452a *//
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o // rang byang chub la skye ba @452a *//
translated: The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-affliction, and non-purification of the state of a worthy one is the purity of the state of a worthy one.

original: med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rang byang chub yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rang byang chub yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-arising, non-ceasing, non-affliction, and non-purification of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is the purity of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the knowledge of path aspects is the purification of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification of the knowledge of all aspects is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is purified because space is purified.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: how is the perfection of wisdom purified because space is purified?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti,

original: skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: because of non-production, non-stopping, non-defilement, and non-purification,

original: nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: it is pure like space.🔽Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: because of the non-going of space,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su @452b dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su @452b dag pa lags /
translated: why is the perfection of wisdom pure because of the non-going of space?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir /
translated: because space is ungraspable,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.🔽Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir /
translated: because space is not a convention,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: How is it that space is beyond conventions?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
translated: How is it that the perfection of wisdom is pure because space is free from conventions?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

analyzed: rab 'byor / nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

translated: In the same way, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure because space is inexpressible.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is pure because space is non-apprehensible.🔽Subhūti said,

translated: how is the perfection of wisdom pure because space is non-apprehensible?🔽Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: rab 'byor / nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do // rab 'byor / de bzhin du nam mkha' rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir /
translated: “Subhūti, nothing is apprehended in space.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, the perfection of wisdom is pure because the nature of space is non-apprehensible.

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, all dharmas are unborn, unceasing, unsoiled, and unpurified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure because all phenomena are utterly pure.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na /
translated: “Blessed One, if any son or daughter of good family were to hold, carry, read, and properly pay attention to this perfection of wisdom,

original: bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung @453b bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung @453b bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Blessed One, they would not develop any eye disease.

original: rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They would not develop any ear, nose, tongue, body, or limb disease.

original: lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They would not have an ugly body.

original: rgas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They would not have an old, decrepit body.

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde pa mi spong bas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde pa mi spong bas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That son or daughter of good family would not die an untimely death, without having given up their discomfort.

original: de'i slad bzhin lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i slad bzhin lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te /

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang /🔽snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang /

translated: the gods of the Heaven of the Four Great Kings, the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, the Yāma Heaven, the Tuṣita Heaven, the Nirmāṇarati Heaven, the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin Heaven, the Brahmakāyika Heaven, the Brahmapurohita Heaven, the Brahmapārṣadya Heaven, the Mahābrahmā Heaven,

original: 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the Parīttābha Heaven, the Apramāṇābha Heaven, the Ābhāsvara Heaven, the Parīttaśubha Heaven, the Apramāṇaśubha Heaven, the Śubhakṛtsna Heaven, the Bṛhatphala Heaven, the Avṛha Heaven, the Atapa Heaven, the Sudarśana Heaven, and the Akaniṣṭha Heaven will follow behind him.

original: gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Wherever a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family teaches this perfection of wisdom, there a great gathering of gods will come together on the eighth, fourteenth, and fifteenth days.

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: And that son of a good family or daughter of a good family teaching this perfection of wisdom will increase a lot of merit.

analyzed: @454a *// rigs bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba tshad ma mchis pa /

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa /

original: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //

analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la /

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: @456b dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
