original: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
translated: those who have entered the stream exist,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do // phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
translated: There are those who are once-returners.

original: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
translated: There are those who are non-returners.🔽There are arhats.

original: @457b rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: @457b rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: There are pratyekabuddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do //
translated: There are bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: There are tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas.

original: de bas na de la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called the precious perfection.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni /
translated: In this precious perfection

original: chos gang yang skye ba'am /🔽'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
analyzed: chos gang yang skye ba'am / 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
translated: there is no dharma that arises🔽or ceases,

original: rnam par byang ba'am /🔽yongs su gzung ba'am /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'am / yongs su gzung ba'am /
translated: is defiled or purified,🔽is appropriated,

original: dor ba med do //
analyzed: dor ba med do //
translated: or is rejected.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba'am /🔽'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'am /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba'am / 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'am /
translated: it is because there is no such dharma that arises🔽or ceases,🔽is defiled or purified,🔽is appropriated,

original: yongs su gzung ba'am /🔽dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do //
analyzed: yongs su gzung ba'am /🔽dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do //
translated: or is rejected.

original: rab 'byor / pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am /
translated: In this jewel of a perfection, Subhūti, no wholesome dharmas,

original: mi dge ba'am /🔽'jigs rten pa'am /
analyzed: mi dge ba'am / 'jigs rten pa'am /
translated: unwholesome dharmas,🔽mundane dharmas,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am /
translated: supramundane dharmas,

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
translated: defiled dharmas,

original: zag pa med pa'am /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'am /
translated: undefiled dharmas,

original: 'dus byas sam /
analyzed: 'dus byas sam /
translated: compounded dharmas,

original: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de /
translated: or uncompounded dharmas are apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do //
translated: Subhūti, for this reason too this jewel of a perfection is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang 'go ba med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang 'go ba med do //
translated: Subhūti, in this jewel of a perfection no dharma can be found.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med do //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med do //
translated: Because such a dharma that could be found is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, for this reason too this perfection is a perfection that is not found.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang @458a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang @458a *//
translated: Subhūti, if bodhisattva great beings who have newly set out in the vehicle see, hear, or apprehend this perfection of wisdom, they will be afraid, will be terrified, will be overcome with fear.

original: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽they do not form the notion that ‘I am practicing the perfection of wisdom.’

original: de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te /
translated: They do not think like that, do not apprehend like that,

original: de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na /
analyzed: de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na /
translated: and do not proliferate like that.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste /
translated: They practice the perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: and meditate on the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o //🔽sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: They please the lord buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste /
translated: They go from buddhafield to buddhafield, having set out to honor, venerate, respect, and worship the lord buddhas,🔽and they do not regress from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o //
translated: and they go from buddhafield to buddhafield, bringing beings to maturity and purifying a buddhafield.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa'am /🔽rnam par ston pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa'am / rnam par ston pa'am /
translated: “Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom does not teach any dharma,🔽does not demonstrate any dharma,

original: yongs su ston pa'am /🔽'dzin par byed pa'am /
analyzed: yongs su ston pa'am / 'dzin par byed pa'am /
translated: does not show any dharma,🔽does not hold any dharma,

original: 'byin par byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'byin par byed pa'am /

original: skye bar byed pa'am /🔽'gog par byed pa'am /
analyzed: skye bar byed pa'am / 'gog par byed pa'am /

original: kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'am /🔽rnam par byang bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'am / rnam par byang bar byed pa'am /
translated: does not defile any dharma,🔽does not purify any dharma,

analyzed: 'grib par byed pa'am /

original: 'phel bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'phel bar byed pa'am /

original: rab 'byor / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin /

original: gnas par byed pa ma yin /

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin /

analyzed: gnas par byed pa ma yin ////

translated: They do not abandon them.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin /
translated: They do not accomplish the result of stream enterer.

original: 'dor ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor ba ma yin /
translated: They do not abandon it.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin /
translated: They do not accomplish the result of once-returner.

original: 'dor ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor ba ma yin /
translated: They do not abandon it.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin /
translated: They do not accomplish the result of non-returner.

original: 'dor ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor ba ma yin /
translated: They do not abandon it.

original: dgra @460a *// bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin /
analyzed: dgra @460a *// bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin /
translated: it is not the attainment of arhatship,

original: 'dor ba ma yin /🔽rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor ba ma yin / rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin /
translated: nor is it the relinquishment of arhatship.

original: 'dor ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'dor ba ma yin /
translated: It is not the attainment of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,🔽nor is it the relinquishment of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin /🔽'dor ba ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin / 'dor ba ma yin /
translated: It is not the attainment of the knowledge of path aspects,🔽nor is it the relinquishment of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin /🔽'dor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin / 'dor ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects,🔽nor is it the relinquishment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin /
translated: This perfection of wisdom does not relinquish the compounded element,

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: nor does it attain the uncompounded element.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
translated: whether the tathāgatas have arisen

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /
translated: or whether the tathāgatas have not arisen,

original: chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te /
translated: the true nature of dharmas, the dharma-constituent, the establishment of dharmas, and the certification of dharmas remain just as they are.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas so //
translated: The tathāgatas have fully awakened to that,

original: mngon par thugs su chud do //
analyzed: mngon par thugs su chud do //
translated: and they have fully understood that.

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: He has fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo //🔽ston to // rjod do /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo // ston to // rjod do /
translated: Having fully awakened, he teaches.🔽He explains.

original: 'grel to; ;rnam par 'byed do //🔽gsal bar mdzad do //
analyzed: 'grel to; ;rnam par 'byed do // gsal bar mdzad do //
translated: He elucidates.🔽He makes clear.

original: yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: yang dag par ston to //
translated: He reveals.

original: de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po stong gi bar snang la 'khod nas lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung ste; lha rdzas kyi me tog autpal dang / padma dang / ku mud dang / punda ri ka dang / manda ra ba dang / manda ra ba chen pos 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to //
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po stong gi bar snang la 'khod nas lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung ste; lha rdzas kyi me tog autpal dang / padma dang / ku mud dang / punda ri ka dang / manda ra ba dang / manda ra ba chen pos 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to //
translated: Then many thousands of gods up to many hundreds of thousands of gods, standing in the sky, let loose a cry, scattered divine blue lotus, lotus, white water lily, white lotus, and mandārava and great mandārava flowers, and uttered this kind of statement:

original: kye ma @460b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas /
analyzed: kye ma @460b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas /
translated: “Oh! By the teaching of this perfection of wisdom,

original: lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te /
analyzed: lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te /
translated: many thousands of gods up to many hundreds of thousands of gods have given rise to acceptance of the fact that phenomena are not produced.

original: dzambu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dzambu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the elder Subhūti:

original: rab 'byor / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba'ang ma yin /
translated: “Subhūti, because of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, this is not a second turning of the wheel of Dharma.

original: gcig tu bskor ba'ang ma yin no //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang chos gang yang 'khor ba'am /
analyzed: gcig tu bskor ba'ang ma yin no // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang chos gang yang 'khor ba'am /
translated: It is not a single turning.🔽This perfection of wisdom also does not abide in order to make any dharma turn or

original: mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: not turn.🔽” Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am /
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am /
translated: in that way, this perfection of wisdom does not abide in order to make any dharma turn or

original: mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags /
analyzed: mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags /
translated: not turn. What is that emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /
translated: The perfection of concentration is empty of the perfection of concentration.🔽The perfection of perseverance is empty of the perfection of perseverance.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of patience is empty of the perfection of patience.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of morality is empty of the perfection of morality.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of giving is empty of the perfection of giving.

original: nang stong pa nyid nang stong @461a *//🔽pa nyid kyis stong ngo //🔽phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid nang stong @461a *// pa nyid kyis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Inner emptiness is empty of inner emptiness.🔽Outer emptiness is empty of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is empty of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is empty of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the great is empty of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is empty of the ultimate.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned is empty of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is empty of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is empty of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is empty of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded is empty of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo; ;chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo; ;chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena is empty of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of its own mark is empty of its own mark,🔽the emptiness of non-apprehension is empty of non-apprehension,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of non-entities is empty of non-entities,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature is empty of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is empty of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are empty of the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag @461b par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag @461b par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the right efforts are empty of the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo //🔽dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo // dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the legs of miraculous power are empty of the legs of miraculous power,🔽the faculties are empty of the faculties,

original: stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the powers are empty of the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the limbs of awakening are empty of the limbs of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo //
translated: the noble eightfold path is empty of the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the truths are empty of the truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the meditative stabilities are empty of the meditative stabilities,

original: tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the immeasurables are empty of the immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: and the formless absorptions are empty of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the liberations are empty of the liberations,🔽the concentrations are empty of the concentrations,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the formless absorptions are empty of the formless absorptions,🔽the emptiness gate of liberation is empty of the emptiness gate of liberation,🔽the signless gate of liberation is empty of the signless gate of liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ngo //
translated: the wishless gate of liberation is empty of the wishless gate of liberation,🔽the powers are empty of the powers,🔽the fearlessnesses are empty of the fearlessnesses,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽the aspects of the path are empty of the aspects of the path,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the meditative stabilizations are empty of the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are empty of the dhāraṇī gateways,🔽the ten tathāgata powers are empty of the ten tathāgata powers,🔽the four fearlessnesses are empty of the four fearlessnesses,🔽the four detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the four detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽the knowledge of all aspects is empty of the knowledge of all aspects,🔽the path is empty of the path,🔽the perfections are empty of the perfections,🔽the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are empty of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,🔽the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are empty of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas are empty of the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams @462a *//
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams @462a *//
translated: the four fearlessnesses are empty of the four fearlessnesses,🔽the four detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the four detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽the knowledge of all aspects is empty of the knowledge of all aspects,🔽the path is empty of the path,🔽the perfections are empty of the perfections,🔽the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are empty of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are empty of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,🔽the ten powers of the t

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo //🔽byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong ngo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo // byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong ngo //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽great love is empty of great love,

original: snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ngo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ngo //
translated: great compassion is empty of great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo //
translated: the result of stream enterer is empty of the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo //
translated: the result of once-returner is empty of the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo //
translated: the result of non-returner is empty of the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the state of a worthy one is empty of a state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo //
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is empty of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects is empty of the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is empty of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po ste; 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po ste; 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o //
translated: “Lord, this perfection of the bodhisattva great beings is a great perfection, namely the perfection of wisdom, which is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la /
analyzed: de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la /
translated: It is that all dharmas are empty of all dharmas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par @462b 'tshang rgya ba ma
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par @462b 'tshang rgya ba ma
translated: and bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of wisdom fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, but do not fully awaken to any dharma at all,

original: mchis / chos kyi 'khor lo'ang skor la /🔽chos gang yang 'khor ba'am /🔽mi 'khor ba'am /
analyzed: mchis / chos kyi 'khor lo'ang skor la / chos gang yang 'khor ba'am / mi 'khor ba'am /

original: rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te /
analyzed: rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te /
translated: or turn any dharma at all.

original: de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba'am /
analyzed: de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba'am /
translated: They do not see any phenomenon at all.

original: yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis pa'o //
translated: They do not see any dharma at all that is seen or not seen.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am /🔽mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'am /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am / mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'am /
translated: Why is this?🔽Because no dharma is apprehended that would cause one to enter samsara,

original: rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te /
analyzed: rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te /
translated: or that would cause one not to enter samsara,🔽or that would cause one to enter into complete nirvana.

original: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o //
translated: Because all dharmas are utterly unapprehendable.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am /
translated: Why is this?🔽Emptiness does not cause one to enter samsara,

original: mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so //🔽mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am /
analyzed: mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so // mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am /
translated: or not to enter samsara.🔽Signlessness does not cause one to enter samsara,

original: mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so //🔽smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am /
analyzed: mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so // smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am /
translated: or not to enter samsara.🔽Wishlessness does not cause one to enter samsara,

original: mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so //
analyzed: mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so //
translated: or not to enter samsara.

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / rab tu 'god pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang / smos pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / rab tu 'god pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang / smos pa dang /
translated: This teaching, clear revelation, proclamation, establishment, presentation, analysis, explanation,

analyzed: gsal bar bgyi ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o //

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de'ang sus kyang ma bstan /

analyzed: sus kyang ma bzung ngo //

original: gang sus kyang ma bstan /🔽sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni /
analyzed: gang sus kyang ma bstan / sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni /

translated: “Lord, this perfection is the perfection of liberation.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the eight liberations are non-apprehensible.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāriputra replied, “Lord,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is so!

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: This perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the successive stages of meditative absorption.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ” The Lord said, “Because the nine successive stages of meditative absorption are non-apprehensible.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” Śāriputra replied, “Lord,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is so!

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This perfection of wisdom is the perfection of generosity.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; sbyin pa dang ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; sbyin pa dang ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ” The Lord said, “Because generosity and avarice are non-apprehensible.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” Śāriputra replied, “Lord,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is so!

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bcom ldan @470a *//
translated: This perfection of wisdom is the perfection of moral discipline.

original: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Lord said,

original: tshul khrims dang tshul khrims ngan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang tshul khrims ngan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Because neither morality nor immorality can be apprehended.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: Śāriputra then said, “Blessed One,🔽this perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: gnod sems dang bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” The Blessed One said, “Because neither malice nor patience can be apprehended.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: ” Śāriputra then said, “Blessed One,🔽this perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: le lo dang brtson 'grus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” The Blessed One said, “Because neither laziness nor diligence can be apprehended.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: ” Śāriputra then said, “Blessed One,🔽this perfection of wisdom

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: bsam gtan dang 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: shes rab dang 'chal ba'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ” The Blessed One said, “Because wisdom and poor wisdom are not apprehended.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / 'di lta ste /
translated: ” He said, “Blessed One,🔽this perfection of wisdom

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ” The Blessed One said, “Because all phenomena are invincible.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / 'di lta ste /
translated: ” He said, “Blessed One,🔽this perfection of wisdom

analyzed: @470b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro; ;gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: ” He said, “Blessed One,🔽this perfection of wisdom🔽is the perfection of the four kinds of unimpeded knowledge.

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di lta ste /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: From the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines,

original: le'u nyid shu dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u nyid shu dgu pa'o ////
translated: Chapter XXIX.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rna lam du grag pa de dag ni /
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rna lam du grag pa de dag ni /
translated: Then Śatakratu, head of the gods, thought this:

original: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni /
analyzed: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni /
translated: Those sons and daughters of good family in whose presence this perfection of wisdom is being taught, they will have served the former Jinas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o //
translated: Those beings in whose presence this perfection of wisdom is being taught, they will have planted wholesome roots under the Tathagatas.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni; dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni; dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung pa'o //
translated: Those beings in whose presence this perfection of wisdom is being taught, they are taken hold of by the spiritual benefactors.

original: gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzung ba dang / 'chang @471b ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzung ba dang / 'chang @471b ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te /
translated: How much more so those who take up this perfection of wisdom, bear it in mind, recite and study it, and as it has been taught so they practice it!

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su
translated: Those sons and daughters of good family who, when this perfection of wisdom is being taught, do not tremble, are not frightened or terrified, they have asked the Tathagatas, the Arhats, the fully enlightened Buddhas of the past,

original: dris so // yongs su zhus so //
analyzed: dris so // yongs su zhus so //
translated: they have questioned them,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do //
translated: “Those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who, having heard this perfection of wisdom, do not tremble, feel frightened, or become terrified, and having heard it take it up, bear it in mind, read it aloud, master it, and properly pay attention to it, have practiced the perfection of giving for many billions of eons.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do //
translated: They have practiced the perfection of morality.🔽They have practiced the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do //
translated: They have practiced the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do //
translated: They have practiced the perfection of concentration.🔽They have practiced the perfection of wisdom.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Śāriputra said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord!

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa @472a *//
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa @472a *//
translated: “Son of noble family, or daughter of noble family, who, having heard this profound perfection of wisdom, does not tremble, is not frightened, and is not fearful, and who, having heard it, takes it up, bears it in mind, reads it aloud, masters it, and properly pays attention to it,🔽

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: “Those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who, having heard this deep perfection of wisdom, are not frightened, are not struck with fear, are not fearful, and having heard it take it up, bear it in mind, read it aloud, master it, and properly pay attention to it🔽should be known

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o //
translated: to be like irreversible bodhisattva great beings.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste /
translated: this perfection of wisdom is deep.

original: sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: It is not easy to understand the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pas ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pas ni /
translated: Because they have not practiced the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos kyang mos par bgyi bar mi nus so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos kyang mos par bgyi bar mi nus so //
translated: even if they hear this deep perfection of wisdom they will be unable to believe in it.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems pa dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems pa dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to //
translated: those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who, on hearing this deep perfection of wisdom, think to reject it have already rejected this deep perfection of wisdom in the past.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe; dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe; dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste /
translated: It is because those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage have no faith in and no belief in this deep perfection of wisdom when it is being taught.

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te /
translated: Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage have not in the past served the lord buddhas, the bodhisattvas, or the listeners.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
translated: How should they practice the transcendent perfection of generosity?

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni @472b ji ltar spyad par bgyi /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni @472b ji ltar spyad par bgyi / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
translated: How should they practice the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline?🔽How should they practice the transcendent perfection of tolerance?

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
translated: How should they practice the transcendent perfection of perseverance?

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi /
translated: How should they practice the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi /🔽nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi / nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom?🔽How should they cultivate the emptiness of internal phenomena?

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the emptiness of external phenomena?

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they meditate on the emptiness of the external and the emptiness of the internal?

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they meditate on the emptiness of emptiness?

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they meditate on the emptiness of great extent?

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they meditate on the emptiness of ultimate reality?🔽How should they meditate on the emptiness of conditioned phenomena?

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they meditate on the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena?🔽How should they meditate on the emptiness of beyond extremes?

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they meditate on the emptiness of no beginning and no end?

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they meditate on the emptiness of nonrepudiation?

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they meditate on the emptiness of inherent existence?

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they meditate on the emptiness of all phenomena?

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they meditate on the emptiness of specific characteristics?

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one meditate on the emptiness of non-apprehension?

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one meditate on the emptiness of non-entities?🔽How should one meditate on the emptiness of essential nature?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one meditate on the emptiness of non-entity of non-entities?

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one meditate on the applications of mindfulness?

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ji ltar bsgom @473a *//
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ji ltar bsgom @473a *//
translated: How should one meditate on the right efforts?

original: par bgyi / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /🔽dbang po rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: par bgyi / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi / dbang po rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one meditate on the legs of miraculous power?🔽How should one meditate on the faculties?

original: stobs rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: stobs rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one meditate on the powers?

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one meditate on the branches of enlightenment?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one meditate on the noble eightfold path?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one meditate on the noble truths?

original: bsam gtan rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the meditative stabilities be cultivated?

original: tshad med pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the boundless attitudes be cultivated?

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the formless meditative absorptions be cultivated?

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the eight aspects of liberation be cultivated?

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the nine serial steps of meditative absorption be cultivated?

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the emptiness aspect of liberation, the signlessness aspect of liberation, and the aspirationlessness aspect of liberation be cultivated?

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the forms of extrasensory perception be cultivated?

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the meditative stabilities be cultivated?

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the dhāraṇī gateways be cultivated?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the ten powers of the tathāgatas be cultivated?

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the four forms of fearlessness be cultivated?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should the four forms of correct understanding be cultivated?

original: byams pa chen po ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: byams pa chen po ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one cultivate great love?

original: snying rje chen po ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should one cultivate great compassion?🔽How should one cultivate the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas?”

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres @473b pa bco brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres @473b pa bco brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus /
translated: He did not ask,

original: yongs su ma dris so //
analyzed: yongs su ma dris so //
translated: he did not inquire.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
translated: Then Śatakratu, head of the gods,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab na /
translated: since this perfection of wisdom is so deep,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: when this deep perfection of wisdom is being taught,

original: sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che /
analyzed: sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che /
translated: it is no wonder that bodhisattva great beings who have not trained in the past will not be confident.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang; chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang; chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,🔽the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi @474a *//
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi @474a *//
translated: There are the four applications of mindfulness, the four correct exertions,

original: rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
analyzed: rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
translated: the four supports for miraculous ability, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
translated: the formless absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
translated: the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love,

original: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che; btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che; btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: great compassion, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, the knowledge of all aspects, the knowledge of the path, and the knowledge of all things as they are and of all things in their variety—what is so amazing about that?🔽“Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the perfection of wisdom!

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: One who pays homage to the perfection of wisdom pays homage to the gnosis of omniscience.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa /🔽de de bzhin no //🔽koo shi ka /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa / de de bzhin no // koo shi ka /
translated: Then the Lord said to Śatakratu, head of the gods:🔽“So it is, Kauśika!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: So it is, Kauśika!

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag @474b 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag @474b 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: One who pays homage to the perfection of wisdom pays homage to the gnosis of omniscience.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do; ;rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do; ;rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do //
translated: from this has come the knowledge of all aspects of the lord buddhas, and from the knowledge of all aspects the perfection of wisdom is proclaimed.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of all modes should stand in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of path aspects should stand in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of all aspects should stand in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of all bases should stand in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of all beings should stand in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of all dharmas should stand in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of the knowledge of paths should stand in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of the knowledge of all aspects should stand in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of the knowledge of all bases should stand in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of the knowledge of all beings should stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o //
translated: “Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of the knowledge of all dharmas should stand in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Noble sons or noble daughters who wish to stand in the knowledge of the knowledge of the modes of the path should stand in the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o // sems can rnams lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: A son of good lineage or daughter of good lineage who wishes to establish sentient beings in the result of stream-enterer should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.🔽A son of good lineage or daughter of good lineage who wishes to establish sentient beings in the result of once-returner should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can rnams phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi @475a *//🔽bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi @475a *// bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: A son of good lineage or daughter of good lineage who wishes to establish sentient beings in the result of non-returner should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can rnams dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //

translated: A son of good lineage or daughter of good lineage who wishes to establish sentient beings in the state of a worthy one should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can rnams rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //🔽sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o // sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: A son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who wants to establish beings in the state of a pratyekabuddha should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.🔽A son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who wants to establish beings in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: A son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who wants to establish beings in the state of buddhahood should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.

original: khams gsum gyi phul du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi phul du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: A son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who wants to be the best in the three worlds should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bdud pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: bdud pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: A son of good lineage or daughter of good lineage who wishes to defeat the demons should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.

original: dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //🔽de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

translated: A son of good lineage or daughter of good lineage who wishes to gather a community of monks should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Lord having said that, Śatakratu, head of the gods, said to him,

original: ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags /
