translated: they make an effort at the formless absorptions?

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: How is it that when they practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: they make an effort at the eight deliverances?

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: How is it that when they practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: they make an effort at the nine serial absorptions?

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: How is it that when they practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: they make an effort at the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are doors to liberation?

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags /🔽ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i @477b tshe; ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags / ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i @477b tshe; ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that when they practice the perfection of wisdom they exert themselves in the clairvoyances?🔽How is it that when they practice the perfection of wisdom they exert themselves in the meditative stabilizations?

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags /🔽ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags / ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: How is it that when they practice the perfection of wisdom they exert themselves in the dhāraṇī gateways?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtson par bgyid pa lags /🔽ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtson par bgyid pa lags / ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: How is it that when they practice the perfection of wisdom they exert themselves in the ten tathāgata powers?

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How is it that when they practice the perfection of wisdom they exert themselves in the four fearlessnesses?

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: How is it that when they practice the perfection of wisdom they exert themselves in the four detailed and thorough knowledges?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they strive in the four detailed and thorough knowledges?

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: How, when practicing the perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: byams pa chen po la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: do they strive in great love?

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

original: snying rje chen po la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la brtson par bgyid pa lags /

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: How, when practicing the perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: do they strive in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so //
analyzed: de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so //
translated: it is good, good that you have thought to ask the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha about this matter.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

analyzed: khyod kyi spobs pa 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ngo ////
translated: this eloquence of yours has come about through the Buddha’s blessing.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /

analyzed: bam po nyis brgya tham pa //

original: koo shi ka /🔽'di la byang chub sems @478a *//
analyzed: koo shi ka / 'di la byang chub sems @478a *//

analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Here, when a bodhisattva great being practices the perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: gzugs la mi gnas te /
translated: they do not dwell on form.

analyzed: gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la brtson par byed do //

analyzed: gzugs la mi gnas te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

translated: he strives in the sensation that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the tongue.🔽He does not dwell on the sensation that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the body,

original: gang gi tshe lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed do //

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te /
translated: He does not dwell on the sensation that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the mind,🔽and when he does not dwell on the sensation that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the mind,🔽he strives in the sensation that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the mind.

original: gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed do // sa'i khams la mi gnas te /
translated: then they are diligent with regard to the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mental faculty.🔽They do not dwell on the earth element,

analyzed: gang gi tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do // don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: gang gi tshe thog ma dang tha @481b ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /

original: gang gi tshe dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /
translated: they are diligent in the emptiness of nonrejection.🔽They do not stand in the emptiness of nature,

analyzed: gang gi tshe rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do // chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas te / gang gi tshe mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do //

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas te / gang gi tshe dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do //
